name: spoiler-converter
title: Discord Spoiler Spammer
description: Discord Spoiler Spammer converts every character of the selected text into it's own spoiler. Laugh at your friends on Discord as they continue clicking to reveal the never ending spoilers!
author: Vaibhav-Satishkumar

commands.name: index
commands.title: Spam Spoiler
commands.description: Convert Selected Text to Spam Spoiler. The format is as follows: word => ||w||||o||||r||||d||.
